intro: An online book review app created by React and node. Database not configured, however backed db set to handle by node. Application has two roles. Admin and visitor. for visitor, everyone can login through email and password, where admin conly required a special passkey: currently set as 'admin'. Admin will assign book review task for visitor so when visitor will login, they can see their task and complete task before expiry date (i.e. 5 days after assign task)
